Review Text:
The postcard of one of the most iconic places in Raja Ampat!
We arrived on the island of Pianemo by boat from the Fam Islands and from here we reached the top to see the view. About 250 wooden steps lead up a slope through dense vegetation.
The scenery is breathtaking with green, clear and crystalline waters surrounded by small islands.
On one side there is a star-shaped lagoon!
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

Review Text: There is no doubt that this is a hotspot. The climb with just over 300 steps is comfortable and shady. At the top you are rewarded with a great panorama
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

Review Title: Panorama like the one you see on the web
Review Text: I went on an excursion organized by the Palau Mansuar resort where I stayed overnight. Long journey but worth it. You go up an easy staircase and the view is breathtaking.
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

Review Text: Beautiful place .. super coral reef .. boongalow only bed with mosquito net but just look around and you are happy
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

Review Text:
The views from the top are just phenomenal !!
The climb to the top on the wooden steps is pretty easy. We were there on a quiet day so had a lot of time to take photos and just admire the amazing view.
This place has to be on your bucket list !!
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

Review Title: Beautiful views but beware the boat ride to get there
Review Text: Easy walk up the well built stairs, with trees in the middle left in place rather than cut down. No entrance fee. No services really either. Pick a day with light winds or you'll regret it. Must cross huge expanse of open ocean with zero protection from swell and wind waves and can be a very rough and unpleasant crossing as it was the day we went.
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

Review Text: I always wanted to visit this place since I watched the beautiful islands and islets in a docu. I can say now that I saw the most beautiful place on earth. We were lucky to visit it right after the pandemic so the croud wasn't back yet. I'm trullt in love with this place. I wish to see myself again in Piameno again!
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

Review Text: View poin da non perdere, e possibilmente con il sole. Si attracca al moletto e con una facile scalinata si sale ad una terrazza da cui si gode un panorama stupendo.
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

Review Title: Alucinante e impactante la belleza de este lugar.
Review Text: Lugar impresionante. Las vistas son increibles, te dejan sin palabras, habíamos visto fotos pero tengo claro que  toda esta belleza no se puede plasmar en una foto. No se puede dejar de visitar este lugar si has llegado a Raja Ampat. El snorkell que hicimos de camino fue espectacular también.
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

Review Text: The view is worth the steps. We were lucky to go on a quiet day so enjoyed the walk up the steps in peace and had the viewing decks to ourselves. Its a hot walk but worth it. You dont need to spend too much time here and sure it isnt as enjoyable when crowded.
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

Review Text: El lugar es impresionante, con sus aguas color turquesa y tapizado de vegetación. No sé si el dinero que cobran, que no es poco, por entrar en esta Área de Conservación se emplea bien o mal, pero el algunos puntos se ven plásticos dejados por los visitantes. La visita fue en viernes, así que coincidí con varios cientos de turistas locales que abarrotaban la cima para hacerse la foto de rigor. Lo que hice fue marcharme y regresar a media tarde cuando ya casi había desaparecido el gentío. El baño que me dí en esas aguas a esas horas fue maravilloso.
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

Review Text: Assolutamente da non perdere. Si sale, grazie a una facile scalinata di 300 gradini a una piattaforma da cui di vede il panorama. Vi è una tassa di ingresso da pagare per la barca che vi porta. Quando sono stata io la tassa era di IDR 300.000
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

Review Text: Pianemo Islands are well worth a visit when you are going to Raja Ampat. I recommend to arrange snorkeling or scuba diving there.
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

Review Text: Une journée fabuleuse en bateau avec visite de Pianemo, très jolie panorama à voir au Raja Ampat. Un bon souvenir
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

Review Text: What an amazing experience i had. The whole islands are just beautiful and untouched with nature and water. We did the expedition of this islands for 3 weeks and what can i say i loved everyday.
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

Review Text: You have to visit on a good day to appreciate the views. Its getting touristy now but still gorgeous and worth a visit.
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

Review Text: Na ostrovy Piaynemo  v  lokalitě Raja Ampat  jsme zavítali při výletech lodí po Famském  souostroví... určitě nejfotografovanější a nejznámější je vyhlídka na Piaynemu. Každopádně nejen na vyhlídku se dá jít , ale dá se i šnorchlovat a potápět se v blízkém okolí  a nebo zakotvit u nedaleké pláže ve skryté laguně a  užívat si slunce a soukromí.
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

Review Text: Gehört zu den pittoresken Zielen in Raja Ampat! Das ist auch zu Recht so ! Außerdem kommt man auf dem Weg dorthin an den besten Tauchplätzen vorbe!
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

Review Text: Went there in November. We were the only tourists on the island. The view is very nice, it’s worth it !
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

Review Text:
Die Aussicht ist wirklich schön, leider ist der Ort teilweise total überfüllt. Es wird alles auf Massentourismus ausgelegt. Schade.
Zudem gefällt mir nicht, dass scheinbar immer noch Touristen die Kokosnuss-Krabben kaufen, diese werden nachts von anderen Inseln eingesammelt und dort quasi ausgerottet, wie Einheimische der Inseln uns erzählten.
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

Review Text: Luogo magico per la sua bellezza. Già quando ci si avvicina in barca per entrare nella laguna interna si inizia ad apprezzare questa meraviglia della natura. Una volta entrati si prosegue lentamente per ovvi motivi e questo permette di immergersi in un ambiente lagunare fatto di grandi formazioni rocciose ricoperte di alberi che emergono dall'acqua verde smeraldo, uno scenario visibile in pochi altri luoghi al mondo (come Wayang). Questo scenario si appezza ancora di più da una terrazza panoramica posta ad una certa altezza facilmente raggiungibile attraverso una comoda scala. Va detto che lo scenario completo e maggiormente coinvolgente si può cogliere solo con una visione dall'alto (vedi foto). Con il mio drone ho avuto l’opportunità di filmare tutta la bellezza di Piaynemo e dell’arcipelago di Raja Ampat in generale, video che poi ho pubblicato sul mio canale Youtube.
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

Review Title: かなり観光地化してしまったが綺麗
Review Text: 以前はワイルドな階段を登って展望台に辿り着いたものでしたが、きれいでフラットな木製の階段ができていて誰でも登り易くなりました。ラジャアンパットの典型的な景色の一つです。
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

Review Text: La plus belle chose que nous avons vu de notre vie ! et on était tout seul ! Réserve qui offre un magnifique point de vue après la grimpette d'env 300 marches (escalier en très bon état).
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

Review Text:
Raja ampat adalah surga yang jatuh di bumi papua
Begitu indah...mempesona , tak henti mata ini menikmati indah nya..gugusan pulau yang begitu..indah...
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

Review Text: Piaynemo berada di Kepulauan Pam Distrik Waigeo Barat Kepulauan Kabupaten Raja Ampat dan Raja Ampat Sunrise Homestay berada di Kepuluan Pam perjalanan dari homestay  ke Piaynemo di tempuh dalam 20 menit,dan tempat ini sangat nyaman dan indah untuk berwisata disana..
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.
